sql-case.value: ALTER TABLE t_log ADD COLUMN column1 varchar(10)
ALTER TABLE t_log ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS column1 varchar(10)
ALTER TABLE t_order_item ADD PRIMARY KEY(id)
ALTER TABLE t_order_item ADD FOREIGN KEY (order_id) REFERENCES t_order (order_id) ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE CASCADE
ALTER TABLE t_log ALTER COLUMN column1 TYPE varchar(20)
ALTER TABLE t_log DROP COLUMN column1
ALTER TABLE t_log DROP COLUMN IF EXISTS column1
ALTER TABLE t_order_item DROP CONSTRAINT idx_id
ALTER TABLE t_order_item DROP CONSTRAINT IF EXISTS idx_id
ALTER INDEX idx_id RENAME TO idx_id
ALTER INDEX IF EXISTS idx_id RENAME TO idx_id
